public class CheckingArrayList<E>
extends java.util.ArrayList<E>

This class simply extends java.util.ArrayList by a single method: addIfNotContained(E e). It takes an object of Type E as its argument and will add it to the ArrayList if it is not yet contained in it. This means that a code statement like CheckingArrayList
